titleStmt.title: Some small and simple reasons, delivered in a hollow-tree, iu [sic] Waltham Forrest, in a lecture, on the 33. of March last. By Aminadab Blower a devout bellows-mender of Pimlico. Shewing the causes in generall and particular wherefore they doe, might, would, should, or ought, except against and quite rufuse the liturgy or Book of Common-Prayer.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Postscript signed: J.T. John Taylor has reference to Arminadab Blower in B.M.
Date in Latin on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
